attributes.action: give the British people the right to decide whether the UK should remain a member of the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Lisbon Treaty is ratified and there is nothing the British people can do about it because our politicians have decided to deny us the right to cast our verdict on a United States of Europe that they are so keen we should belong to. The only question therefore that can be asked of the British people is to decide, once and for all, whether they wish the UK to remain a member of the EU.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
